body_html:
@rizar @damienmg did you ever progress this?

to recreate the problem you can use this file

Dockerfile
https://gist.github.com/johndpope/d41a7d6daf8652cbdaff41a2b063c801

docker build -t syntaxnet .

which does all these steps
https://gist.githubusercontent.com/johndpope/fc1c2327a4ae255d9c44dda9b67b5288/raw/371c6dcc8734638981bfc75016b31882e76b90d8/parseyapi.sh
